home.welcome: Welcome to the Új Élet Baptista Gyülekezet
home.join-us: Join us for worship every Sunday at 10:00 AM

history.title: Our History
history.p1: The Bapti Hungarian Baptist Church was founded in 1995 by a small group of Hungarian immigrants seeking to establish a place of worship that preserved their cultural heritage while sharing the gospel.
history.p2: Over the years, our congregation has grown from just 15 members to over 200 today. We've been blessed to expand our facilities and our ministries to serve both the Hungarian community and the broader local population.
history.p3: Throughout our history, we have remained committed to our founding principles of faith, community service, and preserving Hungarian Baptist traditions.

beliefs.title: Our Beliefs
beliefs.intro: As a Baptist church, we hold to the fundamental beliefs of the Christian faith. Here are some of our core beliefs:
beliefs.item1: The Bible is the inspired and infallible Word of God.
beliefs.item2: Salvation comes through faith in Jesus Christ alone.
beliefs.item3: Baptism by immersion for believers is a public declaration of faith.
beliefs.item4: The church is a community of believers called to worship, fellowship, and service.
beliefs.item5: We are committed to spreading the gospel through missions and outreach.

pastor.name: Pastor John Smith
pastor.title: Senior Pastor
pastor.bio: Pastor John has served our congregation for 15 years. He holds a Master of Divinity degree and is passionate about expository preaching and pastoral care.

elder.name: Elder Michael Nagy
elder.title: Church Elder
elder.bio: Elder Michael has been a pillar of our church since its founding. His wisdom and dedication to the congregation have guided us through many seasons of growth.

services.title: Our Services
services.overview: Join us for worship and fellowship at Bapti Hungarian Baptist Church. We offer various services to nourish your spiritual life.

details.title: Sunday Worship Service
details.description: Our Sunday worship services are a time to come together as a community to worship God through music, prayer, and the teaching of God's Word. Services typically last about 90 minutes.
details.expect1: Uplifting worship music blending traditional hymns and contemporary songs
details.expect2: Scripture-based, practical teaching from the Bible
details.expect4: Children's program and nursery available for all services

details.title: Wednesday Bible Study
details.description: Our mid-week Bible studies provide a more intimate setting for deeper study of God's Word, questions, discussion, and prayer.
details.current-topic: We are currently studying the Book of Romans, exploring Paul's teachings on salvation, righteousness, and living by faith.
details.quote: For I am not ashamed of the gospel, because it is the power of God that brings salvation to everyone who believes. - Romans 1:16

details.title: Community Prayer Gathering
details.description: Prayer is central to our faith and our church life. We gather weekly to lift up our church, community, and world in prayer.
